Mass. Gen. Laws ch. 260, \u00a7 2A (stat.raw_text: Mass. Gen. Laws ch. 260, § 2A (statute of limitations for tort actions)
Mass. Gen. Laws ch. 260, \u00a7 2A (stat.proposition: The Massachusetts statute of limitations applicable to personal injury and property tort actions is three years from the date of injury under Mass. Gen. Laws ch. 260, § 2A (statute of limitations for tort actions) (Plaintiff asserts this action is timely; incident date March 15, 2023).
